forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 47F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 5C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 49F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
